concerns.evidence: Sometimes I think they'd be better off without me dragging them down. ... But I just wish I could disappear sometimes.
concerns.recommended_action: The patient reports passive suicidal ideation (wish to disappear, belief family would be better off) and significant hopelessness/guilt, coupled with severe functional impairment (missing 3 days of work). Patient denies active intent, plan, or preparatory behaviors when directly asked. Risk requires active management, monitoring, and immediate follow-up. Continue detailed C-SSRS monitoring.

output_data.summary: Patient reports significant depressive symptoms, including functional impairment (missing work), early morning awakening, severe guilt/worthlessness, and passive suicidal ideation (wishes to disappear, thinks family would be better off). Active intent and plan were denied.
